skills.name: Elfenlied
skills.description: [SP: 8][CD: 20s] Summons and deploys the weapon: emits light beams that eviscerates enemies within range for 10s. Each hit deals 250% ATK of Fire DMG. While the cross is deployed, attacks of allies within the AOE gain 15.0% Elemental DMG.

skills.name: Chant
skills.description: In Burst mode, character gains 40% Total DMG Multiplier.
